personalDetails.name: Samin Tejas
personalDetails.title: Backend Developer
personalDetails.shortBio: Im a backend developer from kerala,India, Currently working at 6D technologies banglore where im working on reliable, high-performance backend systems for the past 3 years. I'm also an audiophile, creating music under the name Stellarmantra.
personalDetails.longBio: I love building things that not only just work but work fast and efficiently. For the past 3 years, I’ve been part of an awesome team at 6D Technologies, where I’ve been helping create fast, reliable backend systems and utilities — mostly for telecom billing. We’ve rolled out some pretty cool next-gen solutions that have made a real difference in speeding up and improving billing systems using frameworks like spring boot, outside 6d ive also teamed up with few of my friends to develop spaciery - a non-profit project where we develop some usefull utilities.Outside of coding, I’m also really into music production. I make electronic music under the name "Stellarmantra". I use tools like Ableton Live, VCV Rack, and Bitwig Studio , few set of VST plugins , and I love jamming with external hardwares.Oh, and did I mention I’m a Linux guy? Yeah, I use Arch, by the way :) !
